name: Grim Delver
description:
Grim Delver is a realm for RUNE by Gila RPGs and requires the RUNE Quickstart and The Grim Coast realm to play. It is a deconstruction of The Grim Coast using the engine in Roguelike Dungeon and the forthcoming Roguelike Megadungeon. 

Take your Engraved on a solo point crawl through a procedurally generated map with randomly placed enemies and a procedurally generated dungeon at every location. Explore these dungeons, unlocking lore and collecting treasure to build up strength to prepare you for your final confrontation against The Ruined King!

Art is by Roque Romero (@RoqueRomero) from Weird Horror Art Pack 1. Thank you to Samuel Mui (@BabblegumSam) for the game idea.
